headline: Benchmark Co Reiterates a Buy Rating on AppLovin Corporation (APP)
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the Best Unstoppable Growth Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 6, Mike Hickey from Benchmark Co. reiterated a Buy rating on the stock with a $775 price target. headline: Is Trending Stock Axon Enterprise, Inc (AXON) a Buy Now?
summary: Axon (AXON) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.
